snippet: Nicklas Backstrom scored 2 minutes 56 seconds into the second overtime Saturday to give Washington a victory over Boston, tying the first-round playoff series at a game apiece.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Washington Capitals defeat Boston Bruins, 2-1, tying the first-round playoff series at a game apiece; other hockey results noted.
lead_paragraph: Nicklas Backstrom scored 2 minutes 56 seconds into the second overtime Saturday to give Washington a victory over Boston, tying the first-round playoff series at a game apiece.

headline.seo: Washington Capitals Gain Playoff Series Tie With Bruins
headline.main: Capitals Go Two Overtimes Before Squaring Series
headline.print_headline: Capitals Go Two Overtimes Before Squaring Their Series
